message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $150 to me, but I understand its value might be different for you. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $180. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $120 for it. I would like to make a counteroffer at $120 to finalize the purchase.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. I am willing to meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $140 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
